title: The Gatekeeper
description: 5 positions. 5 minutes. Prove you are ready.

puzzles.title: Safety First
puzzles.question: Your Queen is under attack. Move her to a safe square where she is NOT captured.
puzzles.coach_hint: Look at the enemy Knight and Bishop. Do not walk into fire.

fail_states.message: Too passive. You block your own King.
Careful! The enemy Knight on c3 can jump to d5 later. Not the safest.

puzzles.title: The Fork
puzzles.question: White to move. Find the move that attacks two pieces at once.
puzzles.coach_hint: Look for a check that also grabs a Bishop.

fail_states.message: You captured the Bishop, but you missed the check! Look for something stronger.
Good principle, but there is a tactic available right now.

puzzles.title: Greed vs. Logic
puzzles.question: Black has a hanging Bishop on g4. Should White take it? Find the best move.
puzzles.coach_hint: If you take the Bishop, is your Queen safe?

fail_states.message: A solid move, but you can challenge him more directly.
You are moving the Knight away from defense. Dangerous.

puzzles.title: The Finisher
puzzles.question: White to move. Deliver Checkmate in 1 move.
puzzles.coach_hint: The enemy King is trapped behind his own pawns. Use the Rook.

fail_states.message: You moved the Rook, but you did not attack the King.
The King is safe. You need to be attacking, not hiding.

puzzles.title: The Race
puzzles.question: White to move. Can the pawn run to promotion, or must you bring the King?
puzzles.coach_hint: Count the squares. If he cannot catch you, run!

fail_states.message: Too slow! The pawn is fast enough to run alone. Do not waste time.
Why move the King? The pawn is the hero here.
